import os
from six.moves import urllib

LOCAL_FOLDER = os.path.join("datasets", "iris")
LOCAL_FILENAME = "iris.data"
REMOTE_URL = "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/iris/iris.data"

def fetch_remote_data(url=REMOTE_URL, path=LOCAL_FOLDER):
    if not os.path.isdir(path):
        os.makedirs(path)
    local_file_path = os.path.join(path, LOCAL_FILENAME)
    urllib.request.urlretrieve(url, local_file_path)
